title: Sicko Jodi Arias Stabs Naked Lover Dead In Shower, Now She's Showered With Cash & Love Letters Behind Bars
itunes:title: Sicko Jodi Arias Stabs Naked Lover Dead In Shower, Now She's Showered With Cash & Love Letters Behind Bars
description:
Jodi Arias stabs her boyfriend, Travis Alexander, 28 times, shoots him and leaves him to die in a shower. Nancy takes a look back at the trial, and finds out more about Arias' life behind bars. Why does she still get dozens of love letters, and what job is she working for 40 cents an hour?

Nancy's expert panel weighs in:

Judge Ashley Willcott: Judge & Trial Attorney

Dr. Brian Russell: Host of "Fatal Vows" on ID

Caryn Stark: Psychologist

Alexis Tereszcuk: Entertainment editor at radaronline.com

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
